XXsspp2_4u:647: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, śūnyatāśūnyataiva taiḥ (ŚsP_II-4_39) pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika śūnyatāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:648: pratiśaraṇaṃ, mahāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:649: eṣaiva kauśika mahāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, paramārthaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:650: eṣaiva kauśika paramārthaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, saṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika saṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, asaṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:651: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, atyantaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika atyantaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, anavarāgraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika anavarāgraśūnyatā
XXsspp2_4u:652: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, anavakāraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika anavakāraśūnyatā
XXsspp2_4u:653: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, prakṛtiśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika prakṛtiśūnyatā
XXsspp2_4u:654: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, sarvadharmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika sarvadharmaśūnyatā
XXsspp2_4u:655: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, svalakṣaṇaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā
XXsspp2_4u:656: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, anupalambhaśūnyataiva
XXsspp2_4u:657: (ŚsP_II-4_40) taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikānupalambhaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, abhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:658: eṣaiva kauśikābhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇam, svabhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:659: eṣaiva kauśika svabhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇam.
XXsspp2_4u:660: smṛtyupasthānāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, samyakprahāṇāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika samyakprahāṇāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:661: prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, ṛddhipādā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika ṛddhipādāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:662: prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, indriyāṇy eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśikendriyāṇi sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, balāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika balāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:663: prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, bodhyaṅgāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika bodhyaṅgāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:664: prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, āryāṣṭāṅgamārga eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa eva kauśikāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ (ŚsP_II-4_41) yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, āryasatyāny eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:665: pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśikāryasatyāni
XXsspp2_4u:666: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaranaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, dhyānāny eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:667: pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika dhyānāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:668: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, apramāṇāny eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:669: pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśikāpramāṇāni
XXsspp2_4u:670: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, ārūpyasamāpattaya eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika
XXsspp2_4u:671: ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:672: pratiśaraṇaṃ, vimokṣā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika vimokṣāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśikānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
XXsspp2_4u:673: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyālḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:674: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:675: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, abhijñā eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:676: pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśikābhijñā
XXsspp2_4u:677: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, samādhaya eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:678: pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika samādhayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:679: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, dhāraṇīmukhāny eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:680: pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika dhāraṇīmukhāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:681: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, tathāgatabalāny eva taiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:682: pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika (ŚsP_II-4_42)
XXsspp2_4u:683: tathāgatabalāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:684: pratiśaraṇaṃ, vaiśāradyāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:685: etāny eva kauśika vaiśāradyāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, pratisaṃvida eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:686: prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, mahākaruṇā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika mahākaruṇā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:687: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, sarvajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika sarvajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:688: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, mārgākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika mārgākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:689: yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, sarvākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika sarvākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:692: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kārayed yojanamuccaitvenārdhayojanaṃ vistareṇāyāṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ divyaiś puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyair vādyaiḥ satkuryā gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
XXsspp2_4u:694: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:695: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (ŚsP_II-4_43) puṇyaṃ prasavati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati
XXsspp2_4u:696: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati, avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyaty uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
XXsspp2_4u:697: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:698: tiṣṭhantu kauśikaikaḥ stūpaḥ sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataparinirvṛte, imaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayais
XXsspp2_4u:699: stūpaiḥ paripūraye yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistātais tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:700: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:701: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:702: prasavati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyati, uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:703: tiṣṭhantu kauśikāyaṃ jāmbūdvīpas tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ, sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ cāturmahādvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjayaiḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair
XXsspp2_4u:704: ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:705: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:706: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:707: prasaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:708: likhitvā nu satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair (ŚsP_II-4_44) gandhair vilepanaiś curṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:710: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ cūḍikaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:711: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:712: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:713: prasaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:714: satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:715: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasracūḍiko lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ madhyamaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca yāvat kṣīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:716: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:717: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:718: prasaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:719: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:720: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte (ŚsP_II-4_45) pūjāyai imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate
XXsspp2_4u:721: parinirvṛte pūjāyair saptaratnamayais tathāgatacaityaiḥ paripūjayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
XXsspp2_4u:722: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:725: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:726: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:727: prasaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:728: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇo ye kecit kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayet tāṃ ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair
XXsspp2_4u:729: divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ, yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
XXsspp2_4u:730: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyati, tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:731: śakra āha: evam etad bhagavan evam etat sugata prajñāpāramitā bhagavan satkurvadbhiḥ gurukurvadbhir mānayadbhiḥ pūjayadbhir atītānagatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkṛto
XXsspp2_4u:733: yāvantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair
XXsspp2_4u:734: (ŚsP_II-4_46) divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś
XXsspp2_4u:736: yāvanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:737: yāvantaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:738: yāvanta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:739: yāvanta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccaistve nārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:740: yāvantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:741: yāvanto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:742: yāvantaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:743: yāvanto 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair
XXsspp2_4u:744: divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:745: yāvanta upariṣṭhād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase? bhagavan api nu sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:747: śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:748: prasavati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati, yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat (ŚsP_II-4_48) kasya hetoḥ? atra hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_4u:749: prajñāpāramitāyām antargatāḥ sarve kuśalā dharmās tad yathā daśa kuśalaḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra
XXsspp2_4u:751: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:752: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
XXsspp2_4u:753: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitā catvāry āryasatyāni duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhanirodhā mārgaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭā
XXsspp2_4u:754: vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvākārajñatā idaṃ tad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ yatra sarvaśrāvkapratyekabuddhānām atitānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ śikṣitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgatā gacchati gamiṣyati ca.
XXsspp2_4u:757: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānāṃ indram etad avocat: evam etat kauśikaivam
XXsspp2_4u:758: etat, bahu te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyaty aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam acintyam atulyam aparimāṇaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca
XXsspp2_4u:759: manasikariṣyanti, uttare ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś
XXsspp2_4u:760: chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:761: prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā vīryapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā kṣāntipāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā śīlapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā dānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā.
XXsspp2_4u:789: prajñāpāramitāniryataḥ, sattvaparipāko buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāniryātā, hi kauśika sarvajñatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā,
XXsspp2_4u:791: prajñāpāramitāniryātā, hi kauśika śrāvakayānaṃ prajñāpāramitāniryātaṃ, hi kauśika pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prajñāpāramitāniryātaṃ, hi kauśika mahāyānaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:793: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputrā vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
XXsspp2_4u:794: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair asya kauśika
XXsspp2_4u:795: puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyam api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśam api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ? yāvat kileyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāṃbūdvīpe sthāsyati.
XXsspp2_4u:796: tāvan na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati, tāvad daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:797: karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:798: catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, pañcānām abhijñānāṃ prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:799: dānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, śīlapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, kṣāntipāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:800: vīryapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, dhyānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, prajñāpāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:801: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, bahirdhāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:802: bhaviṣyati, śūnyatāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, mahāśūnyatāyā
XXsspp2_4u:803: (ŚsP_II-4_51) loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, paramārthaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:804: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, atyantaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, anavarāgraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:805: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:806: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, anupalambhaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, abhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:807: svabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:808: smṛtyupasthānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, samyakprahāṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, ṛddhipādānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:809: indriyāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, balānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:810: bhaviṣyati, bodhyaṅgānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, āryasatyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:811: bhaviṣyati, dhyānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, apramāṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:812: vimokṣāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, samādhīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:813: dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, tathāgatabalānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, vaiśāradyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:814: pratisaṃvidāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, mahāmaitryā loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:816: āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, sarvajñatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, mārgākārajñatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:817: sarvākārajñatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, yāvan mahāśālakulānāṃ loke
XXsspp2_4u:821: trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, yāmānāṃ devānāṃ loke
XXsspp2_4u:822: prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:826: brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, mahābrahmāṇāṃ devānāṃ loke
XXsspp2_4u:827: prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, ābhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:828: parīttabhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, apramāṇābhāṇāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:829: bhaviṣyati, śubhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, parīttaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, apramāṇaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ loke
XXsspp2_4u:830: prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:831: bhaviṣyati, bṛhāṇāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, parīttabṛhāṇāun devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, apramāṇabṛhāṇāṃ devānāṃ loke
XXsspp2_4u:832: prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:833: abṛhāṇāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, atapānāṃ devānāṃ loke
XXsspp2_4u:834: prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, sudṛśānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:835: sudarśanānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:836: srotaāpannānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, sakṛdāgāmīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:837: bhaviṣyati, anāgāmināṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, arhatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:838: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ samudāgaḥ prajñāsyate, anuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ prajñāsyate, dharmacakrapravartanaṃ prajñāsyate,
XXsspp2_4u:841: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
XXsspp2_4u:842: devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavasavartinā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇo ābhāḥ parīttabhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās taṃ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate : udgṛhītavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā vācayitavyā mārṣa
XXsspp2_4u:843: prajñāpāramitā paryavāptavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā, yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā, etayā mārṣa prajñāpāramitayodgṛhītayā
XXsspp2_4u:844: dhārayitayā vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā
XXsspp2_4u:845: (ŚsP_II-4_53) vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā
XXsspp2_4u:847: saṃghanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati buddhanetryā mārṣa avyavacchedo
XXsspp2_4u:849: dānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, śīlapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, kṣāntipāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:850: vīryapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, dhyānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, prajñāpāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:851: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, bahirdhāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:852: bhaviṣyati, śūnyatāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, mahāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, paramārthaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:854: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, atyantaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, anavarāgraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:855: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:856: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, anupalambhaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, abhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:857: svabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:858: smṛtyupasthānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, samyakprahāṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, ṛddhipādānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:859: indriyāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, balānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:860: bhaviṣyati, bodhyaṅgānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, āryasatyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:861: bhaviṣyati, dhyānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, apramāṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:862: vimokṣāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, abhijñānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavisvati, samādhīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:863: tathāgatabalānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, vaiśāradyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, pratisaṃvidāṃ loke prādurbhāvo (ŚsP_II-4_54)
XXsspp2_4u:864: bhaviṣyati, mahāmaitryā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, mahākaruṇāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:866: srotaāpattiphalasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, sakṛdāgāmiphalasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, anāgāmiphalasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:867: arhattvasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, pratyekabodher loke prādurbhāvo
XXsspp2_4u:868: bhaviṣyati, anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:870: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate: udgṛhāṇa tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:871: prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśaś ca manasikuruṣvemāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:872: prajñāpāramitām. tat kasya hetoḥ? yadā kauśikāsurāṇām evaṃ samudācārā
XXsspp2_4u:873: bhaviṣyati, devāṃs trāyastriṃśān yodhayiṣyāmo devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāmas tadā tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhṛtya manasā svadhyāya kuryāḥ yoniśaś ca manasikuryā evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ te samudācārāḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:874: punar evāntarddhāsyati na punas te cittotpādā vivardhiṣyanti, yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ cyutikālaḥ syāṃ te cātmanaḥ pāpopapattiṃ paśyeyus teṣāṃ tvaṃ kauśika purataḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās te tena prajñāpāramitā śravaṇakuśalamūlena prajñāpāranutā prasādena ca tatraiva devabhavaneṣūpapatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ mahārthikā hi
XXsspp2_4u:875: kauśika prajñāpāramitā śravaṇaṃ yasya kasyacit kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotāvabhāsaṃ gamiṣyanti sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
XXsspp2_4u:876: abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvan atīte
XXsspp2_4u:877: 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīhaiva
XXsspp2_4u:879: 'pi ta etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, sarve te ihaiva
XXsspp2_4u:880: prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikātra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve bodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā.
XXsspp2_4u:881: śakra āha: mahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:882: bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā asamasameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta
XXsspp2_4u:883: prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan (ŚsP_II-4_55)
XXsspp2_4u:885: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā, asamasameyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās ta etāṃ vidyām
XXsspp2_4u:886: āgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py etām eva vidyām
XXsspp2_4u:887: āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate, ye 'pi ta etarhi daśa dig lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti
XXsspp2_4u:888: yāpayanti, te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikemāṃ vidyām āgamya daśakuśalā karmapathāḥ loke prajñāyante, catvāri dhyānāni loke
XXsspp2_4u:889: prajñāyante, catvāry apramāṇāni loke prajñāyante, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ loke prajñāyante, pañcābhijñā loke prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:890: dānapāramitā loke prajñāyate, śīlapāramitā loke prajñāyate, kṣāntipāramitā loke prajñāyate, vīryapāramitā loke prajñāyate, dhyānapāramitā loke prajñāyate, prajñāpāramitā loke prajñāyate.
XXsspp2_4u:891: adhyātmaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, bahirdhāśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:892: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, śūnyatāśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:893: mahāśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, paramārthaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:894: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:895: atyantaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, anavarāgraśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:896: anavakāraśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, prakṛtiśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:897: sarvadharmaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:898: anupalambhaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, abhāvaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:899: svabhāvaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate.
XXsspp2_4u:900: smṛtyupasthānāni loke prajñāyante, samyakprahāṇāni loke prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:901: ṛddhipādā loke prajñāyante, indriyāṇi loke prajñāyante, balāni loke prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni loke prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo loke
XXsspp2_4u:902: prajñāyante, āryasatyāni loke prajñāyante, dhyānāni loke prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:903: apramāṇāni loke prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayo loke prajñāyante, vimokṣā loke prajñāyante, anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo loke prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:904: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāṇi loke prajñāyante, abhijñā loke prajñāyante, samādhayo loke prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni loke prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:905: tathāgatabalāni (ŚsP_II-4_56) loke prajñāyante, vaiśāradyāni loke prajñāyante, pratisaṃvido loke prajñāyante, mahākaruṇā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:906: āveṇikabuddhadharmā loke prajñāyante. dharmadhātur loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:907: bhūtakoṭir loke prajñāyate, tathatā loke prajñāyate, avitathatā loke prajñāyate, ananyatathatā loke prajñāyate, dharmatā loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:908: dharmasthititā loke prajñāyate, dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate, pañca cakṣūṃsi loke prajñāyante, srotaāpattiphalaṃ loke prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:909: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ loke prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ loke prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ loke prajñāyate, pratyekabodhir loke prajñāyate, sarvajñatā loke prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā loke prajñāyate, sarvākārajñatā loke prajñāyate, bodhisattvam api kauśikāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:910: prabhāṣyante. catvāri dhyānāni prabhāvyante, catasra arūpyasamāpattayaḥ prabhāvyante, pañcābhijñā
XXsspp2_4u:911: dānapāramitā loke prabhāvyate, śīlapāramitā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:912: kṣāntipāramitā loke prabhāvyate, vīryapāramitā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:913: dhyānapāramitā loke prabhāvyate, prajñāpāramitā loke prabhāvyate.
XXsspp2_4u:914: adhyātmaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, bahirdhāśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:915: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, śūnyatāśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:916: mahāśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, paramārthaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:917: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:918: atyantaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, anavarāgraśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:919: anavakāraśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, prakṛtiśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:920: sarvadharmaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:921: anupalambhaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, abhāvaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:922: svabhāvaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā loke prabhāvyate.
XXsspp2_4u:923: smṛtyupasthānāni loke prabhāvyante, samyakprahāṇāni loke prabhāvyante,
XXsspp2_4u:924: ṛddhipādā loke prabhāvyante, indriyāṇi loke prabhāvyante, balāni loke prabhāvyante, bodhyaṅgāni loke prabhāvyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo loke
XXsspp2_4u:925: prabhāvyate, āryasatyāni loke prabhāvyante, dhyānāni loke prabhāvyante,
XXsspp2_4u:926: apramāṇāni loke prabhāvyante, ārūpyasamāpattayo loke prabhāvyante, vimokṣā loke prabhāvyante, anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo loke prabhāvyante,
XXsspp2_4u:927: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni loke prabhāvyante, abhijñāḥ loke prabhāvyante, samādhayo loke prabhāvyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni loke prabhāvyante, tathāgatabalāni loke prabhāvyante, vaiśāradyāni loke (ŚsP_II-4_57) prabhāvyante, pratisaṃvido loke prabhāvyante, mahākaruṇā loke prabhāvyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmā loke prabhāvyante, sarvajñatā loke prabhāvyate, mārgākārajñatā loke prabhāvyate, sarvākārajñatā loke prabhāvyate, srotaāpanno loke prabhāvyate, sakṛdāgāmī loke prabhāvyate,
XXsspp2_4u:928: anāgāmī loke prabhāvyate, arhan loke prabhāvyate, pratyekabuddho loke prabhāvyate, tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke prabhāvyate.
XXsspp2_4u:929: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvoṣadhitārānakṣatrāṇi
XXsspp2_4u:930: prabhāvyante. evam eva kauśika bodhisattvacandramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvakuśalacaryāsamyakcaryādaśakuśalakarmapathadhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāpāramitāśūnyatābodhipakṣadharmaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāryasatyavimokṣānupūrvavihārasamāpattisamādhidhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmādhayaḥ
XXsspp2_4u:931: prabhāvyante. sarvaśaikṣāśaikṣaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatārānakṣatrāṇi ca prabhāvyante. tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prabhāvyante.
XXsspp2_4u:932: yadāpi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke notpādo bhavati, tadāpi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvebhyo laukikalokottarān dharmān deśayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaniryātā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhamahāyānāni, tac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitāniryātaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:933: veditavyaṃ, yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati, śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati,
XXsspp2_4u:944: smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati. samyakprahāṇeṣu carati, ṛddhipādeṣu carati,
XXsspp2_4u:945: indriyeṣu carati, baleṣu carati, bodhyaṅgeṣu carati, āryāṣṭāṅge marge carati, āryasatyeṣu carati, dhyāneṣu carati, apramāṇeṣu carati,
XXsspp2_4u:946: ārūpyasamāpattiṣu carati, aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu carati, navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu (ŚsP_II-4_58)
XXsspp2_4u:948: carati, dhāraṇīmukheṣu carati, tathāgatabaleṣu carati, vaiśāradyeṣu
XXsspp2_4u:949: carati, pratisaṃvitsu carati, mahākaruṇāyāṃ carati, aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati. na ca śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmisākṣāt karoti, sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati, āyuḥsaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti sattvasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti buddhakṣetrasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti, bodhisattvasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti sarvākārajñatāṃ cānutprāpnoti.
XXsspp2_4u:951: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca
XXsspp2_4u:952: manasikariṣyati, sa ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati
XXsspp2_4u:954: śakra āha: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa
XXsspp2_4u:955: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
XXsspp2_4u:956: udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca
XXsspp2_4u:958: bhagavān āha: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:959: prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, sa na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati, na śastreṇa kālaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:960: kariṣyati, nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati, nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati, yāvan naikottareṇa rāgaśatena kālaṃ kariṣyati, sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ, ye ca puna rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti, sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati, na tasya te
XXsspp2_4u:963: maṃsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tad asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejonubhāvena sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati, tam enaṃ te rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā priyavacanair ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante, ābhāṣitavyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:964: maṃsyate, pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ maṃsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika
XXsspp2_4u:965: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:966: ebhiḥ kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā (ŚsP_II-4_59) kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:967: katamaiś ca kauśika sāṃparāyikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati, yad uta na
XXsspp2_4u:968: jātu daśabhiḥ karmapathair avirahitā bhaviṣyati, na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ, na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir na smṛtyupasthānair na samyakprahāṇair na ṛddhipādair nendriyair na balair na bodhyaṅgair na mārgeṇa nāryasatyair na dhyānair nāpramāṇair nārūpyasamāpattibhir na vimokṣair nānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhair nābhijñābhir na samādhibhir na
XXsspp2_4u:969: dhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāveṇikabuddhadharmair virahitā bhaviṣyanti, na kadācin narakeṣūpapadyate,
XXsspp2_4u:970: na tiryagyonau na yamaloke, anyatra praṇidhānavaśena sattvaṃ paripākaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:971: kariṣyati, sa na kadācid aṅgavihīno bhaviṣyati, na kadācid daridrakuleṣu
XXsspp2_4u:972: pratyājaniṣyati, veṇukarakule vā puṣkasakule vā mauṣṭhikacaṇḍālaurānikasaukārikakuleṣu vā śūdrakuleṣu vā satatasamitaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:973: dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, yatra ca lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti tatra
XXsspp2_4u:974: lokadhātuṣūpapatsyate, na jātu bodhisattvābhijñābhir virahito bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_4u:975: sa ākāṅkṣaṃ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati, buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya sa buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati, buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati, tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā imāṃ guṇasaṃpadām ākāṅkṣadbhir iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā, sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahitena bhavitavyaṃ, ta ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:980: athānyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmaṃ nyāsīt.
XXsspp2_4u:981: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūd, idam anyatīrthikānāṃ śatam
XXsspp2_4u:982: upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma, ya nv ahaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:983: yāvan mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt, itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā udgṛhītaṃ tat svādhyāyaṃ kuryāṃ, yadi me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakām upasaṃkramya bhagavato 'ntarāyaṃ ca kuryuḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām.
XXsspp2_4u:984: atha śakro devānām indro yāvad bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyām udgṛhītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma.
XXsspp2_4u:985: atha te 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
XXsspp2_4u:986: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasyaitad abhūt, kim atra kāraṇaṃ yena me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:987: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataś chāradvatīputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥ, parivitarkam ājāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayataḥ śakreṇa sāradvatīputra devānām indreṇeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā tenaite 'nyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ tāṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ, na hi śāradvatīputra eṣām anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklāṅgaṃ samanupaśyāmi, sarva ete 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā imāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:988: parṣadam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃyante nāhaṃ taṃ śāradvatīputra
XXsspp2_4u:989: samanupaśyāmi, sadevaloke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratihatacitto vā upārambhābhiprāyo vā upasaṃkramen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāradvatīputra ya iha trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau
XXsspp2_4u:990: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇa ābhaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubbā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā anabhrakā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devāḥ, ye ca śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi (ŚsP_II-4_61) bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te
XXsspp2_4u:992: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:994: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:995: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:996: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:998: ye 'pi te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:999: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1000: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1002: ye 'pi te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1003: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1004: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1006: ye 'pi te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1007: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1008: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1010: ye 'pi te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1011: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1012: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1014: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1015: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā (ŚsP_II-4_62) devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
XXsspp2_4u:1016: ye 'pi te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1017: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1018: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1020: ye 'pi te adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1021: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1022: prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1024: ye 'pi te upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1025: bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyam
XXsspp2_4u:1026: prajñāpāramitānugṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve.
XXsspp2_4u:1028: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyas etad abhūd, imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃmukhībhūtā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
XXsspp2_4u:1029: vyākariṣyante, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ya nv ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrameyaṃ vicakṣuṣ
XXsspp2_4u:1030: atha māra pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo 'bhūt.
XXsspp2_4u:1031: atha śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt, māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1032: caturaṅgabalakāyam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ, yaś cāyaṃ mārapāpīyāñ caturaṅgabalakāyasya vyūho nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūho na rājñaḥ prasenajito na sākyānāṃ na licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpavyūhaḥ yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgo varakāyo māreṇa pāpiyasā nirmitaḥ dīrgharātraṃ khalu punar mārapāpīyān
XXsspp2_4u:1034: viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, ya nv aham imāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_63) prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā ca svādhyāyaṃ kuryāt.
XXsspp2_4u:1035: atha śakro devānām indra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharati sma, smṛtyā ca svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma, yathā yathā śakro devānām indra imāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1036: prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma, tathā tathā mārapāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva pratyudāvartate sma.
XXsspp2_4u:1037: atha tatra parṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇi vāsāṃsi cābhinirmāya vaihāyasy antarikṣe sthitvaiva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti sma, yena bhagavāṃs tenābhiprakiranti sma. evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta, ciraṃ bateyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhagavatāṃ yāvat kileyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakān manuṣyān prajñāpāramitānuvartiṣyante tāvan na tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati saddharmasya ca cirasthitikatāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1038: bhaviṣyati, saṃgharatnasya ca loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ caryāviśeṣaḥ prajñāsyate, yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā kuladuhitaro vā likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā ālokajātā ca sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavyā sanāthāvigatās
XXsspp2_4u:1039: tamondhakārā ca me sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavya.
XXsspp2_4u:1041: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indrakāṃś cākaniṣṭhaparyato devaputrān etad avocat: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, evam etad devaputrā evam etat, yāvad imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā anuvartiṣyante, tāvat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati saddharmasya ca
XXsspp2_4u:1042: cirasthitikatā bhaviṣyati saṃgharatnasya ca loke prajñāyate yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yāvat samanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatasyārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:1043: sarvadharmasya ca cirasthitikatā bhaviṣyati, saṃgharatnasya ca loke
XXsspp2_4u:1044: prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati, bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ caryāviśeṣaḥ
XXsspp2_4u:1045: prajñāsyate, yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā kuladuhitaro vā likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā ālokajātā
XXsspp2_4u:1046: ca sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavyā sanāthāvigatās tamondhakārā ca me sā dik
XXsspp2_4u:1048: atha te devaputrā punar api divyāni kusumāni abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhiprakiranti sma, evañ ca vācam abhāṣanta, yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati (ŚsP_II-4_64)
XXsspp2_4u:1049: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas manasikariśyati. na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante, vayam api bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? śāstāram eva bhagavaṃs
XXsspp2_4u:1050: tam asya mahāśāstāram anyataraṃ vā yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
XXsspp2_4u:1052: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat: na te bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā avarakena kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
XXsspp2_4u:1053: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, sarvajinamanasikārās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
XXsspp2_4u:1054: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāś ca te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca
XXsspp2_4u:1055: bhaviṣyanti, kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca te bhagavan kulaputrā vā
XXsspp2_4u:1056: kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? ato hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā gaveṣitavyā yad uta
XXsspp2_4u:1057: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ, ataś ca punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyā, yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānyā prajñāpāramitānyā sarvākārajñatānyā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca sarvākārajñatā nānyādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1058: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat prajñāpāramitāniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
XXsspp2_4u:1059: sarvākārajñātāniryātā ca prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika
XXsspp2_4u:1060: nānyā prajñāpāramitānyā sarvākārajñatā nānyā sarvākārajñatānyā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca sarvākārajñatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1063: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat: na tathā bhagavān
XXsspp2_4u:1064: dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā śīlapāramitāyā
XXsspp2_4u:1065: nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā kṣāntipāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1066: parikīrtayati, na tathā vīryapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā dhyānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā prajñāpāramitāyā
XXsspp2_4u:1068: na tathā bhagavān adhyātmaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā śūnyatāśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā mahāśūnyatāyā
XXsspp2_4u:1069: nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā paramārthaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1070: parikīrtayati, na tathā saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathātyantaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathānavarāgraśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1071: parikīrtayati, na tathānavakāraśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā prakṛtiśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathānupalambhaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathābhāvaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
XXsspp2_4u:1072: na tathā svabhāvaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
XXsspp2_4u:1073: na tathā smṛtyupasthānānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā samyakprahāṇānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā ṛddhipādānāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1074: nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathendriyāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā balānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā bodhyaṅgānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1075: parikīrtayati, na tathāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
XXsspp2_4u:1076: yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathāryasatyānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā dhyānānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ prarikīrtayati, yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1080: parikīrtayati. na tathā samādhīnāṃ nāmadheyani parikīrtayati, na tathā dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathā daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tatha caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
XXsspp2_4u:1081: na tathā catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā mahāmaitryā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, na tathā mahākaruṇāyā nāmadheyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1082: parikīrtayati, na tathāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati, yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
XXsspp2_4u:1083: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitā ānandaḥ pūrvāṅgamā pariṇāyikā yad uta
XXsspp2_4u:1084: pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśānāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ, āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām
XXsspp2_4u:1085: ārūpyasamāpattīnām aṣṭāṇāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām abhijñānāṃ samādhīnāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśatathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām. tat kiṃ manyase? ānandāpariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati.
XXsspp2_4u:1087: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1090: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati?
XXsspp2_4u:1092: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1095: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati?
XXsspp2_4u:1097: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ prajñāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati?
XXsspp2_4u:1098: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. api tu khalu punaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan śīlapāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1099: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1100: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan vīryapāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1101: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan dhyānapāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1102: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1104: bhagavān āha: advayayogenānanda pariṇāmitaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati, advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1105: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati, advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:1106: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitā kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati, advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati,
XXsspp2_4u:1107: anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati, advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1108: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati, advayayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā
XXsspp2_4u:1109: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati.
XXsspp2_4u:1110: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1111: dānapāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:1112: bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati?
XXsspp2_4u:1114: pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati? katham
XXsspp2_4u:1115: anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati? katham
XXsspp2_4u:1116: anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_68) prajñāpāramitā bhavati? katham
XXsspp2_4u:1118: bhagavān āha: rūpasyādvayayogena, vedanāyā advayayogena, saṃjñāyā
XXsspp2_4u:1156: ṛddhipādānām advayayogena, indriyāṇām advayayogena, balānām advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1163: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām advayayogena, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām advayayogena, catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām advayayogena, mahāmaitryā
XXsspp2_4u:1164: advayayogena, mahākaruṇāyā advayayogena, aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1166: arhattvasyādvayayogena, pratyekabodher advayayogena, anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher advayayogena.
XXsspp2_4u:1168: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ vedanāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1169: kathaṃ saṃjñāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ saṃskārāṇām advayayogena, kathaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1184: kathaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā advayayogena?
XXsspp2_4u:1185: kathaṃ pṛthivīdhātor advayayogena, katham abdhātor advayayogena, kathaṃ tejodhātor advayayogena, kathaṃ vāyudhātor advayayogena, katham ākāśadhātor advayayogena, kathaṃ vijñānadhātor advayayogena?
XXsspp2_4u:1186: katham avidyāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ saṃskārāṇām advayayogena, kathaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1188: ṣaḍāyatanasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ sparśasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ vedanāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ tṛṣṇāyā advayayogena, katham upādānasyādvayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1189: kathaṃ bhavasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ jāter advayayogena, kathaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1191: kathaṃ dānapāramitāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ śīlapāramitāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1192: kathaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ vīryapāramitāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1193: kathaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā advayayogena?
XXsspp2_4u:1194: katham adhyātmaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā advayayogena, katham adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ mahāśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1195: katham asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, katham atyantaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, katham anavarāgraśūnyatāyā advayayogena, katham anavakāraśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1196: kathaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, katham anupalambhaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, katham abhāvaśūnyatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1198: kathaṃ smṛtyupasthānānām advayayogena, kathaṃ samyakprahāṇānām advayayogena, katham ṛddhipādānām advayayogena, katham indriyāṇām (ŚsP_II-4_71) advayayogena, kathaṃ balānām advayayogena, kathaṃ bodhyaṅgānām advayayogena, katham āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyādvayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1199: katham āryasatyānām advayayogena, kathaṃ dhyānānām advayayogena, katham apramāṇānām advayayogena, katham ārūpyasamāpattīnām advayayogena, katham aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣām advayayogena, katham anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām advayayogena, kathaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1200: katham abhijñānām advayayogena, kathaṃ samādhīnām advayayogena, kathaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānām advayayogena, kathaṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām
XXsspp2_4u:1201: advayayogena, kathaṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām advayayogena, kathaṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām advayayogena, kathaṃ mahāmaitryā advayayogena, kathaṃ mahākaruṇāyā advayayogena, katham aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām
XXsspp2_4u:1204: arhattvasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ pratyekabodher advayayogena, kathaṃ mārgākārajñatāyā advayayogena, kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā advayayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1206: tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā.
XXsspp2_4u:1207: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃjñā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhlkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1208: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃskārā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1209: cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1210: tathā hi śrotraṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1211: advaidhīkāraṃ, jihvā jihvayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, kāyaḥ kāyeṇa śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, mano manasā śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śūnyaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1213: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1214: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoh? tathā hi śabdaś
XXsspp2_4u:1215: ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, gandhaḥ gandhena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi gandhaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1216: raso rasena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rasaś ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1217: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
XXsspp2_4u:1218: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dharmāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1219: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1220: advaidhīkāraṃ, jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manovijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1221: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1222: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1223: kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1224: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1225: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā (ŚsP_II-4_73) śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1226: tathā hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1227: advaidhīkāraṃ, ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1228: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1229: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1230: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1232: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi pṛthivīdhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, abdhātur abdhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abdhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1233: advaidhīkāraṃ, tejodhātuḥ tejodhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tejodhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vāyudhātur vāyudhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vāyudhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1234: advaidhīkāraṃ, ākāśadhātur ākāśadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ākāśadhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānadhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1235: avidyā avidyayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy avidyā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1236: tathā hi saṃskārāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1237: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpeṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāmarūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1238: tathā hi sparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1239: advaidhīkāraṃ, tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tṛṣṇā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, upādānam (ŚsP_II-4_74) upādānena
XXsspp2_4u:1240: śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy upādānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1241: advaidhīkāraṃ, bhavo bhavena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoh? tathā hi bhavaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ. jātir jatyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1242: tathā hi jātiś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāmarūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1243: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bahirdhāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1244: śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śūnyatāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mahāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, paramārthaśūnyatā paramārtaśūnyatayā śūnyā.
XXsspp2_4u:1245: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi paramārthaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1246: advaidhīkāraṃ, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1247: tathā hy saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1248: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, atyantaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, anavarāgraśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anavarāgraśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, anavakāraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anavakāraśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1249: etad advaidhīkāraṃ, prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1250: sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1251: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1252: anupalambhaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoh? tathā hy anupalambhaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad. advaidhīkāram, abhāvaśūnyatā
XXsspp2_4u:1253: (ŚsP_II-4_75) abhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhāvaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, svabhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svabhāvaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_4u:1254: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca pāramitā cādyayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi samyakprahāṇāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ṛddhipādāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1255: indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hīndriyāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi balāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhyaṅgāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1256: advaidhīkāraṃ, mārgo mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mārgaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āryasatyāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1257: dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dhyānāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy apramāṇāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1258: ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vimokṣāś ca pāramitā cādvayam
XXsspp2_4u:1260: śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhijñāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi samādhayaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1261: advaidhīkāraṃ, dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1262: tathā hi (ŚsP_II-4_76) dhāraṇīmukhāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, daśatathāgatabalāni daśatathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi daśatathāgatabalāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_4u:1263: advaidhīkāraṃ, vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vaiśāradyāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoh? tathā hi pratisaṃvidaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mahākaruṇā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1264: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1265: srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpattiphalena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1266: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphaIena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, anāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anāgāmiphalaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, arhattvam arhattvena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1267: tathā hy arhattvaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabodhyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy pratyekabodhiś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mārgākārajñatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad
