XXsspp2_4u:1782: tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante, ratnapāramitāyā bhagavaṃs tāni
XXsspp2_4u:1783: tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ, tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante,
XXsspp2_4u:1785: tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante, anutpādānirodhapāramitāyā
XXsspp2_4u:1786: (ŚsP_II-4_113) bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ, tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante, anāyūhāniyūhapāramitāyā bhagavaṃs tāni
XXsspp2_4u:1787: tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ, tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante,
XXsspp2_4u:1789: tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante, anāgatyagatyasthitipāramitāyā bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ, tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
XXsspp2_4u:1790: pūjāṃ labhante, dharmatāpāramitāyā bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
XXsspp2_4u:1791: bhājanaṃ, tayā ca dharmatāpāramitayā paribhāvitāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
XXsspp2_4u:1792: tena parinirvṛtasyāpi tasya tathāgatasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1795: punar aparaṃ bhagavan tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāḥsro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhāḥ, sacet bhagavan daśasu dikṣuḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhā bhaveyur yac ca prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyetaḥ, anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ? ato niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
XXsspp2_4u:1796: tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjyaṃte prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitani bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
XXsspp2_4u:1797: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu yāmeṣu deveṣu tuṣiteṣu deveṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu sukham anubhūya tenaiva kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati, etāvat tathāgataśarīrapūjāyāḥ phalam imāṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan samādhipāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti, vīryapāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti, kṣāntipāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti, śīlapāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti, dānapāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_4u:1808: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayiṣyati, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni paripūrayiṣyati, catura ṛddhipādān paripūrayiṣyati, pañcendriyāṇi
XXsspp2_4u:1809: paripūrayiṣyati, pañca balāni paripūrayiṣyati, sapta bodhyaṅgāni paripūrayiṣyati, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ paripūrayiṣyati. catvāry āryasatyāni paripūrayiṣyati, catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayiṣyati, catvāry apramāṇāni paripūrayiṣyati, catasra ārūpyasamāpattiḥ paripūrayiṣyati, aṣṭau vimokṣān paripūrayiṣyati, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ paripūrayiṣyati,
XXsspp2_4u:1812: daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrayiṣyati, catvāri vaiśāradyāni paripūrayiṣyati, catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ paripūrayiṣyati, mahāmaitrīṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1815: śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati, bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya bodhisattvābhijñāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:1817: saṃkramiṣyati, sa saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhīṣyati, yair ātmabhāvaḥ sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati, yadi vā cakravartāśrayaṃ yadi vā kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā
XXsspp2_4u:1818: gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā śakrarūpeṇa yadi vā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yadi vā vaiśramaṇarūpeṇa sa tair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati, tasmāt tarhi bhagavan na mama tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpy apratyayā nāpy apūjayitukāmatā nāpy agrahītukāmatā.
XXsspp2_4u:1819: api tu khalu punar bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatā gurukurvatā mānayatā pūjayata sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ hetur upacito bhavati sarvasaṃpattayaś ca parigṛhītā
XXsspp2_4u:1820: bhavanti, tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkṛtā bhavanti gurukṛtāni bhavanti yāni tāni bhavanti pūjitāni
XXsspp2_4u:1821: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1822: (ŚsP_II-4_115) aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyate yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti tān dhharmakāyena ca jñānakāyena ca
XXsspp2_4u:1823: draṣṭukāmena pūjayitukāmena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā, sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsakhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ drakṣyati. evaṃ khalu tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca tāṃ buddhān anusmṛtibhāvayitavyā dharmatayā.
XXsspp2_4u:1824: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
XXsspp2_4u:1825: saṃdraṣṭukāmena, kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā, dharmatāyā dve ime bhagavan dharmatā.
XXsspp2_4u:1826: katame dve saṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1827: tatra bhagavan katamā saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmatā? yad adhyātmaśūnyatāyaṃ jñānaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1828: yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad mahāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad sarvadharmaśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānam.
XXsspp2_4u:1829: yac caturṣu smṛtyupasthānāneṣu jñānaṃ, yac caturṣu samyakprahāṇāneṣu
XXsspp2_4u:1830: jñānaṃ, yac caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu jñānaṃ, yat pañcasv indriyeṣu jñānaṃ, yat pañcasu baleṣu jñānaṃ, yat saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu jñānaṃ, yad āryāṣṭāṅge marge jñānaṃ, yac caturṣv āryasatyeṣu jñānaṃ, yac caturṣu dhyāneṣu jñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_4u:1831: yac caturṣv apramāṇeṣu jñānaṃ, yac catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu jñānaṃ, yad aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu jñānaṃ, yan navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu jñānaṃ, yañ chūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vimokṣamukheṣu jñānaṃ, yat pañcasv abhijñāsu
XXsspp2_4u:1832: jñānaṃ, yat sarvasamādhiṣu jñānaṃ, yat sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu jñānaṃ, yad daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu jñānaṃ, yac (ŚsP_II-4_116) caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu jñānaṃ, yac catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu jñānaṃ, yan mahāmaitryāṃ jñānaṃ, yan mahākaruṇāyāṃ jñānaṃ, yad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu jñānaṃ, yat kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ, yad akuśaleṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ, yat sāśraveṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ, yad anāśraveṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ, yal laukikeṣu dharmeṣu
XXsspp2_4u:1833: jñānaṃ, yal lokottareṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ, iyam ucyate saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1835: tatra katamā asaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā? yasyā notpādo na nirodho na sthānaṃ na sthito nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhir yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā,
XXsspp2_4u:1836: katamā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā? abhāvasvabhāvā hi sarvadharmā iyam
XXsspp2_4u:1838: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani
XXsspp2_4u:1839: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ, ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante, ye 'pi
XXsspp2_4u:1840: te etarhi daśadig lokadhātuṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti, te
XXsspp2_4u:1842: abhisaṃbudhyante, ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atītānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1843: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ, ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ, ye 'py etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ, te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti
XXsspp2_4u:1844: ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti
XXsspp2_4u:1845: prāpnuvanti ca, ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atite 'dhvani pratyekabuddhāḥ, ye 'pi
XXsspp2_4u:1846: te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani pratyekabuddhā, ye 'pi te etarhi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti tair apīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya pratyekabodhiḥ prāptāḥ prāpsyate prāpyate ca. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyā sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni, tāni punar animittayogenānupalambhayogenānutpādayogenānirodhayogenāsasaṃkleśayogenāvyavadānayogenānabhisaṃskārayogenānāyūhayogenāniryuhayogenānukṣepayogenāprakṣepayogenānugrahayogenānutsargayogena
XXsspp2_4u:1847: (ŚsP_II-4_117) tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:1848: na hi prajñāpāramitā āramitā na pāramitā na hi prajñāpāramitā apāro na pāraḥ, na sthalaṃ na nimnaṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na
XXsspp2_4u:1849: laukikī na lokottarā na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā na kuśalā nākuśalā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā, na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmānāṃ dātrī, na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā srotaāpattidharmāṇāṃ dātrī, na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī, na hi kauśika
XXsspp2_4u:1850: prajñāpāramitā anāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī, na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā arhaddharmāṇāṃ dātrī na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī, na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dātrī.
XXsspp2_4u:1852: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā, atra bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajānanti na sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate nātmanam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam
XXsspp2_4u:1853: upalabhate na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakam upalabhate na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam
XXsspp2_4u:1855: na rūpam upalabhate, na vedanām upalabhate, na saṃjñām upalabhate, na saṃskārām upalabhate, na vijñānam upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1856: na cakṣur upalabhate, na śrotram upalabhate, na ghrāṇam upalabhate, na jihvām upalabhate, na kāyam upalabhate, na manasam upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1857: na rūpam upalabhate, na śabdam upalabhate, na gandham upalabhate, na rasam upalabhate, na sparśam upalabhate, na dharmān upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1858: na cakṣurvijñānam upalabhate, na śrotravijñānam upalabhate, na ghrāṇavijñānam upalabhate, na jihvāvijñānam upalabhate, na kāyavijñānam upalabhate, na manovijñānam upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1859: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśam upalabhate, na śrotrasaṃsparśam upalabhate, na ghrāṇasaṃsparśam upalabhate, na jihvāsaṃsparśam upalabhate, na kāyasaṃsparśam upalabhate, na manaḥsaṃsparśam upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1860: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanām upalabhate, na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanām upalabhate, na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanām upalabhate, (ŚsP_II-4_118) na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanām upalabhate, na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanām upalabhate, na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanām upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1861: na pṛthivīdhātum upalabhate, nābdhātum upalabhate, na tejodhātum upalabhate, na vāyudhātum upalabhate, nākāśadhātum upalabhate, na vijñānadhātum upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1862: nāvidyām upalabhate, na saṃskārām upalabhate, na vijñānam upalabhate, na nāmarūpam upalabhate, na ṣaḍāyatanam upalabhate, na sparśam upalabhate, na vedanām upalabhate, na tṛṣṇām upalabhate, nopādānam upalabhate, na bhavam upalabhate, na jātim upalabhate, na jarāmaraṇam upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1863: na dānapāramitām upalabhate, na śīlapāramitām upalabhate, na kṣāntipāramitām upalabhate, na vīryapāramitām upalabhate, na dhyānapāramitām upalabhate, na prajñāpāramitām upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1865: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upalabhate, na śūnyatāśūnyatām upalabhate, na mahāśūnyatām upalabhate, na paramārthaśūnyatām upalabhate, na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām upalabhate, nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām upalabhate,
XXsspp2_4u:1867: nānavakāraśūnyatām upalabhate, na prakṛtiśūnyatām upalabhate, na sarvadharmaśūnyatām upalabhate, na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upalabhate,
XXsspp2_4u:1868: nānupalambhaśūnyatām upalabhate, nābhāvaśūnyatām upalabhate, na svabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhate, nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1869: na smṛtyupasthānāny upalabhante, na samyakprahāṇāny upalabhante, na rddhipādān upalabhante, nendriyāny upalabhante, na balāny upalabhante, na bodhyaṅgāny upalabhante, nāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgam upalabhante, nāryasatyāny
XXsspp2_4u:1870: upalabhante, na dhyānāny upalabhante, nāpramāṇāny upalabhante,
XXsspp2_4u:1871: nārūpyasamāpattīr upalabhante, nāṣṭau vimokṣām upalabhante, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr upalabhante, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny upalabhante, nābhijñā upalabhante,
XXsspp2_4u:1872: na samādhīn upalabhante, na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhante, na daśatathāgatabalāny upalabhante, na vaiśāradyāny upalabhante, na pratisaṃvida upalabhante, na mahāmaitrīm upalabhante, na mahākaruṇām upalabhante, nāveṇikabuddhadharmān upalabhante, na srotaāpattiphalam upalabhante, na sakṛdāgāmiphalam (ŚsP_II-4_119) upalabhante,
XXsspp2_4u:1873: nānāgāmiphalam upalabhante, nārhattvam upalabhante, na pratyekabodhim upalabhante, na mārgākārajñatām upalabhante, na sarvākārajñatām upalabhante, na bodhisattvam upalabhante, na buddham upalabhante, na buddhadharmān upalabhante.
XXsspp2_4u:1874: na hi prajñāpāramitopalambhayogena pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yenopalabhet yad vopapalabhet yatra
XXsspp2_4u:1877: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, yathā hi tad dīrgharātrau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sa
XXsspp2_4u:1878: bodhim api nopalabhhate prāg eva buddhaṃ prāg eva buddhadharmān.
XXsspp2_4u:1879: śakra āha: punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati
XXsspp2_4u:1881: bhagavān āha: sarvāsu kauśika ṣaḍpāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati
XXsspp2_4u:1882: tac cānupalambhayogena. sa dānam api nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate, śīlam api nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlam api nopalabhate, kṣāntim api nopalabhate kṣamīnam api nopalabhate vyāpādam api nopalabhate, vīryam api nopalabhate
XXsspp2_4u:1883: vīryavantam api nopalabhate kauśīdyam api nopalabhate, dhyānam api nopalabhate dhyāyinam api nopalabhate vikṣepam api nopalabhate, prajñām api nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate dauṣprajñam api nopalabhate.
XXsspp2_4u:1884: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānapāramitāparipūraye, prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ
XXsspp2_4u:1887: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryam ālambhamānasya vīryapāramitāparipūraye, prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya
XXsspp2_4u:1932: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām anupalambhayogena, caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānām anupalambhayogena, caturṇām ṛddhipādānām anupalambhayogena, pañcānām indriyāṇām anupalambhayogena, pañcānāṃ balānām anupalambhayogena, saptānaṃ bodhyaṅgānām anupalambhayogena, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyānupalambhayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1933: caturṇām āryasatyānām anupalambhayogena, caturṇāṃ dhyānānām anupalambhayogena, caturṇām apramāṇānām anupalambhayogena, catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām anupalambhayogena, aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇām anupalambhayogena, navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anupalambhayogena.
XXsspp2_4u:1934: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anupalambhayogena, pañcānām abhijñānām anupalambhayogena, sarvasamādhīnām anupalambhayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1935: sarvadhāraṇīmukhānām anupalambhayogena, daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām anupalambhayogena, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām anupalambhayogena, catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām anupalambhayogena, mahāmaitryā anupalambhayogena,
XXsspp2_4u:1941: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nānāpatrāṇāṃ nānāpuṣpāṇāṃ nānāphalānāṃ nānāsaṃkhyānāṃ nānārohapariṇāhānāṃ teṣāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate, anyatra cchāyā cchāyety evaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_122) pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītānāṃ sarvajñajñānapariṇāmitānāṃ ca viśeṣo
XXsspp2_4u:1945: apramāṇaguṇasamanvāgatā aparyantaguṇasamanvagatā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aparyavasānaguṇasamanvāgatayā tayā hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayet tāś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair
XXsspp2_4u:1946: vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair uttare ca yathopadiṣṭāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād yo 'pi
XXsspp2_4u:1947: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt kataras tayor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
XXsspp2_4u:1948: bhagavān āha: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra paripakṣyāmi, yathā te kṣamate
XXsspp2_4u:1949: tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
XXsspp2_4u:1950: tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vadyaiḥ, yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā, tat sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ gṛhītvā satkuyād gurukruyāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ, kataras tayor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:1951: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavatā bhāṣitasvārtham ājānāmi, yo yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ, yo 'pi parasmai sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ dadyād ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, imam eva bhagavann arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyat, tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vajropamaṃ samādhiḥ samāpadyaḥ vajropamam ātmabhāvaṃ bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ sattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ? ye hi kecid
XXsspp2_4u:1952: bhagavan tathagatasyāntasaḥ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ pūjayiṣyanti vividhābhiḥ pūjābhiḥ sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam (ŚsP_II-4_123)
XXsspp2_4u:1954: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukruyād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś cemāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1955: prajñāpāramitāṃ parasmai likhitvā dadyād dharmaprītyā ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:1957: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭā parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīt deśayet saṃprakāśayet vicaret vibhajet uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāñ cāntikād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, śāstaiva saṃpratikāṅkṣitavyānyatarānyatarīyā gurusthānīyā vijñāḥ sabrahmacārī. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa evātra kauśika śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstānyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā śāstaiḥ prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:1958: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
XXsspp2_4u:1959: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca, ye 'pi te vijñāḥ sabrahmacāriṇas te 'pi nānye anyatrāvaivartikabodhisattvebhyo yatra
XXsspp2_4u:1960: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca. atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakayānikā api śikṣitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:1961: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, pratyekabuddhayānikā api śikṣitvā
XXsspp2_4u:1963: bodhisattvā api mahāsattvāḥ śikṣitvā bodhisattvaniyamam avakrāntā avakrāmanti avakrāmiṣyanti ca, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā
XXsspp2_4u:1965: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatān arhataḥ sayakṣaṃbuddhānāṃ mukhaṃ satkartukāmair gurukartukāmair mānayitukāmaiḥ pūjayitukāmaiḥ puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair (ŚsP_II-4_124)
XXsspp2_4u:1966: mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair imaṃ cārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyato 'nuttarāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1967: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaitad abhūt, katamad ahaṃ satkṛtya
XXsspp2_4u:1968: gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ so 'haṃ kauśika sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyām ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ cādhikaṃ vā na samanupaśyāmi, tasya mamaitad abhūd, ya nv eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhaḥ śāntaḥ praṇītas tam eva
XXsspp2_4u:1969: dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ katamaś cāsau kauśika dharmā yad uta saiva prajñāpāramitā aham eva tāvat kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi pūjayāmi satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya viharāmi, kim aṅga punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ, śrāvakayānikair vā kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā pratyekabudhayānikair api kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā
XXsspp2_4u:1970: gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniryātāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tathāgataniryātāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca
XXsspp2_4u:1971: pratyekabuddhayanikaiś ca kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca śrāvakayānikāś cārhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca pratyekabuddhayānīkāś ca pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca.
XXsspp2_4u:1974: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayeta: sacet kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu
XXsspp2_4u:1975: kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa
XXsspp2_4u:1976: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānāṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:1977: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:1978: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt paṭhanāya vā
XXsspp2_4u:1979: likhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām
XXsspp2_4u:1980: anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti ca avakramiṣyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:1981: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:1982: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca, anagāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca, pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitā
XXsspp2_4u:1983: samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti cāvakramiṣyanti ca, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante.
XXsspp2_4u:1984: katame ca te kauśika sāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ? yad uta catvāri
XXsspp2_4u:1985: smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni.
XXsspp2_4u:1991: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:1992: ime te kauśika anāsravā dharmā ye prajñāpāramitayā nirdiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāś cābhisaṃbudhyante cābhisaṃbhotsyante ca, evaṃ kauśikaikaṃ sattvaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1993: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā (ŚsP_II-4_126)
XXsspp2_4u:1994: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetoḥ? daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu
XXsspp2_4u:1995: karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ sattvā aparimuktā evaṃ narakatiryagyoner yamalokān srotaāpattiphale kauśika sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ parimukto narakatiryagyoner yamalokān, kaḥ punar vādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet, yaś ca punaḥ kauśika sarvajāmbūdvīpakān sattvān
XXsspp2_4u:1996: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet, yaś caikaṃ sattvaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:1997: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, yo vā kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvajāmbūdvīpakān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed yaś ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekam api
XXsspp2_4u:1998: sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? buddhanetryāḥ so vyavacchedāya
XXsspp2_4u:1999: pratipanno bhavati, ya ekasattvam apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika
XXsspp2_4u:2000: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvaniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tad anena kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyo mānayitavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyaḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ, sa devakena lokena samārakena saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2001: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:2003: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2004: prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitva samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2005: srotaapattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti
XXsspp2_4u:2006: prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ praptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2008: prāpsyanti ca, bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā
XXsspp2_4u:2010: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2016: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2017: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry aryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhani ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhani daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā
XXsspp2_4u:2018: mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2019: pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
XXsspp2_4u:2020: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra
XXsspp2_4u:2021: kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2023: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2024: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2025: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2026: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante. abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā (ŚsP_II-4_128) devāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2027: prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2028: ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2029: ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2042: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2043: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2054: prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2055: prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2057: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā (ŚsP_II-4_129)
XXsspp2_4u:2058: vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:2060: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2061: prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā Iekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra
XXsspp2_4u:2062: prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caśikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2063: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2064: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2065: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty
XXsspp2_4u:2066: avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
XXsspp2_4u:2067: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2073: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2074: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_130) vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2076: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2077: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2078: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2079: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2092: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2093: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2099: pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:2104: prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2105: prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2107: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu
XXsspp2_4u:2108: pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro yā kuladuhitā

XXsspp2_4u:2111: prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra
XXsspp2_4u:2112: prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā, avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,

XXsspp2_4u:2114: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2115: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty
XXsspp2_4u:2116: avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
XXsspp2_4u:2117: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramita prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2123: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2124: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni
XXsspp2_4u:2126: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2127: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2128: parīttābbā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇabhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2129: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante. peyālaṃ dānapāramitā prajñāyate, śīlapāramitā prajñāyate, kṣāntipāramitā
XXsspp2_4u:2141: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2142: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2153: prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2154: prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2156: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sahasracūḍikā lokadhātuḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:2157: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
XXsspp2_4u:2158: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2159: prasavet, yo syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vacanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra (ŚsP_II-4_134)
XXsspp2_4u:2160: kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
XXsspp2_4u:2161: avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti
XXsspp2_4u:2162: prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2163: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2164: prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2165: katame ca te kauśikānāsrava dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2171: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2172: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ santadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā, anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt. paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni
XXsspp2_4u:2174: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2175: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ (ŚsP_II-4_135)
XXsspp2_4u:2176: prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2177: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,

XXsspp2_4u:2192: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2207: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ

XXsspp2_4u:2213: prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2214: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,

XXsspp2_4u:2216: avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante

XXsspp2_4u:2312: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kecij jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet (ŚsP_II-4_141) pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭchāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
XXsspp2_4u:2313: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2316: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2317: prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2318: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2319: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2320: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā
XXsspp2_4u:2322: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2328: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2329: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā
XXsspp2_4u:2330: mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā nopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2331: pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
XXsspp2_4u:2332: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra
XXsspp2_4u:2333: kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni (ŚsP_II-4_142)
XXsspp2_4u:2335: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2336: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2337: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2338: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā deyāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2351: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2352: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2358: pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:2363: prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2364: prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2366: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2369: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2370: prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra
XXsspp2_4u:2371: prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2372: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2373: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2374: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty
XXsspp2_4u:2375: avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
XXsspp2_4u:2376: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2382: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2383: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni
XXsspp2_4u:2385: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,

XXsspp2_4u:2486: catvāri smṛtyupasthanāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipadaḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2487: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ (ŚsP_II-4_149)
XXsspp2_4u:2488: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharma vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni
XXsspp2_4u:2490: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2491: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2492: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2493: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2506: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2507: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2518: prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2519: prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2521: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre lokadhātau sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv abhijñāsu
XXsspp2_4u:2522: pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
XXsspp2_4u:2525: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2526: prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ, yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā, avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca.
XXsspp2_4u:2528: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2529: prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
XXsspp2_4u:2530: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2536: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2537: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
XXsspp2_4u:2539: anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2540: likhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2543: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2544: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2545: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubha devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2546: (ŚsP_II-4_152) apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante.

XXsspp2_4u:2674: yāvantaḥ kauśika paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu
XXsspp2_4u:2675: pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
XXsspp2_4u:2678: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (ŚsP_II-4_158) puṇyaṃ prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_4u:2679: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
XXsspp2_4u:2680: avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti
XXsspp2_4u:2681: prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2682: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, pratyekabuddhayanikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2683: prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
XXsspp2_4u:2684: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramita.
XXsspp2_4u:2690: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2691: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ śarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni
XXsspp2_4u:2693: cāturmahārājakāyika devāḥ prajñāyante, trayastriṃśa devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2694: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā
XXsspp2_4u:2696: brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2697: parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2698: śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante,

XXsspp2_4u:2715: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2726: sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2730: yāvantaḥ kauśika uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu

XXsspp2_4u:2854: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2855: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2856: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2869: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2870: prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2876: pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate,
XXsspp2_4u:2881: prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2882: prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2884: yāvantaḥ kauśika dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhapayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
XXsspp2_4u:2886: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsspp2_4u:2887: prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā, avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2888: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2889: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
XXsspp2_4u:2890: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty
XXsspp2_4u:2891: avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante
XXsspp2_4u:2892: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_4u:2898: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_4u:2899: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatāṇimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyapi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni
XXsspp2_4u:2901: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, trāyastriṃśā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2902: yāma devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante, paranimitavaśavartino devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapurohitā devāḥ prajñāyante, brahmapārṣadyā devāḥ prajñāyante, mahābrahmaṇo devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2903: parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2904: apramāṇabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante, abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākaśanantyayatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñayatana devāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2917: prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni
XXsspp2_4u:2918: wprajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
XXsspp2_4u:2929: prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2930: prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante.
XXsspp2_4u:2932: yāvantaḥ kauśika paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.

XXsspp2_4u:2935: prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyaḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ
XXsspp2_4u:2937: avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti
XXsspp2_4u:2938: prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
